remarks: Lemma for ~ aaliou .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Nov-2014.)
statement:
aalioulem2.a $e |- N = ( deg ` F ) $.
aalioulem2.b $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` ZZ ) ) $.
aalioulem2.c $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
aalioulem2.d $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
aalioulem2 $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. RR+ A. p e. ZZ A. q e. NN ( ( F ` ( p / q ) ) = 0 -> ( A = ( p / q ) \/ ( x / ( q ^ N ) ) <_ ( abs ` ( A - ( p / q ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A p q x $.
$d F p q x $.
$d p ph q x $.
